PROFILE AND SEARCH SETTINGS
The profile & search settings offers an in-depth overview of a doctor's profile. This would help patients make informed decisions and choose a relevant doctor. The dashboard will display every new detail updated by the doctor, keeping patients aware of all changes occurring in the service.

PUBLIC SEARCH
  1. A doctor is required to click on the “TURN ON” button to enable the Public Search if he/she wants to be visible in the patient’s search results.
  2. If a doctor has disabled the Public Search, patients cannot see the doctor’s profile in their search results.
  3. Patients can search for a doctor with any attributes that are listed under the Profile and Search section. These attributes can include the business name, Jaldee verified levels, Jaldee-Keyword, Basic Information, Location, Location Amenities, Specialization, Languages Known, Additional Info.
  4. During the initial profile setup, a doctor can proceed with setting the Profile Name & Summary, Location, Working Hours, Service and Public Search status. The doctor can setup or update these informations here.
    • If the doctor logs out of the website after setting the password, the account will not be active. To activate the account, the doctor has to completely fill basic details and turn on the Public Search. At this point, a default service gets created which can be edited in Services under the Check-In Manager.
    • If the doctor logs out of the website after setting up the location, a default service time window gets created. The doctor can edit this from here.
JALDEE VERIFIED LEVELS
  • After creating the profile, a doctor becomes eligible to get their profile verified with Jaldee.
  • To verify your Jaldee account, call us on 0487-2325650 or you can send us an email at support@jaldee.com
  • Being verified by Jaldee allows patients to know that the doctor has been through the Jaldee verification process and is successfully verified.
  • The verified doctor in patient’s search results carries a flag with the profile name. Initially, the verification flag is set to none.
  • The priority of a doctor in patient search results increases with the verification levels.
  • Jaldee has 3 verified levels, namely, Basic, Basic Plus, and Advanced. Details of each verified levels are depicted in the following table:
Basic

  • Provide any two of the following Government ID proof with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
         Basic plus

  • Provide any two of the Government ID proof (with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
         Advanced

  • Provide any two of the Government ID proof (with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
  • Certificates
    • Submit a copy of educational certificates and business license to Jaldee team.
    • Provide two personal references. These two can’t be a family member and they should provide a valid phone number.
    • Should submit more pictures of the business or property.
  • Physical check (by Jaldee employees)
    • Jaldee team will visit the business or property directly.
    • The team will take the actual photograph of the business or property.
    • They will collect the exact GPS coordinates.
    • They will also collect the details of endorsement done by any celebrity or politician.
    IMPORTANT
    • Basic is free of cost.
    • If verification level is set to None, the doctor will not receive any priority in patient’s search results.
    • A charge is applicable for Basic Plus and Advanced verified level.
    • For the verification process, doctors can email the required documents to the Jaldee support team.
    • Safety of the document is our priority. Jaldee.com pledges to keep them safe.
    • These requirements are subject to change and refinement with prior notification to the doctors.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    BASIC INFORMATION
    It displays the Basic information about a business given by the doctor at the time of initial profile setup. The doctor is allowed to edit each section under “Basic Information.” To increase the patient acquisition fill this section with appropriate details.
    1. Click the edit button (pen symbol) to change the business name and description.
    2. Click on the image to change the Profile picture and upload a new one.
    3. Images may include the photograph of your clinic, a photograph of the doctor, etc.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)

    Location
    • The information related to the business’s location comes under this section.
    • Initially the location added to the doctor profile during the initial profile set up, will be automatically set as the base location.
    • The doctor can add multiple locations of the business. The link to add a new location is given here.
    • If the business has multiple locations, then, only the base location is displayed here. The doctor can edit the base location as well. To do so, click on the edit button.
    • To add working hours to the location, a doctor needs to go to “Locations” under “Check-In Manager”.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)

         Location Amenities
    • Location amenities are resources, conveniences, facilities or benefits offered to the patients for their use.
    • A doctor can manage the location amenities here. Choose the available amenities from the list. The following table shows the location amenities for the Health Care Sector.

    1. Doctors
    • 24 hours
    • Emergency Services
    • Trauma Centre
    • First Aid
    • Parking
    2. Dentists
    • 24 hours
    • Emergency Services
    • Parking
    3. Alternate Medicine Practitioners
    • 24 hours
    • Emergency Services
    • Parking
    4. Hospital
    • 24 hours
    • Emergency Services
    • Parking

    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)

         Working Hours
    Working hours of the base location are shown here. The doctor can click here to redirect to the Working Hours page. Here doctor can add or edit the working hours. The working hours for other business locations are also shown in this page.

    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    PRIVACY SETTINGS
    Getting to know and controlling your privacy settings (Phone number & Email address) is an important strategy to protect your information. Here the system allows the doctor to add, edit or delete both phone number and email address.
    Phone
    1. A doctor can view the phone number used to create a Jaldee account. By default, the visibility of the number is set to none.
    2. The three dots menu on the right corner has two options, namely, Edit and Delete.
    3. If a doctor wants to edit an entry, he/she can click on the “Edit” button. Here, the doctor can change the phone number, phone label (for example, mobile, emergency, mainline or others) and also the visibility of the number.
    4. The phone number is shown in the profile’s detailed view in patient’s dashboard. This helps the patients to contact doctor easily.
    5. The doctor has an option to restrict the visibility of the phone number. Two options to filter the visibility are:
      • Public(All can see) : When set to Public, everyone can see the doctor’s number.
      • Private(None can see) : When set to Private, only the doctor can view the phone number.
    6. A doctor can also delete a phone number. To do so, click “Delete” from the three dots menu on the right corner.
         Email
    1. A doctor can add, edit and delete the email address here.
    2. The 3 dots menu on the right corner has two options, viz. Edit and Delete.
    3. In case, a doctor wants to edit an entry, he/she can click on the “Edit” button. Here, the doctor can change the email address, email label (for example,Office Email Id, Personal Email Id, etc.) and also the visibility of the email address.
    4. The email address provided here is shown to the patients in the detailed view of the doctor profile.
    5. The doctor has an option to restrict the visibility of the email address. Three options to filter the visibility are:
      • Public(All can see) : When set to Public, everyone can see the doctor’s email.
      • My Patients only (Patients who checks-in for the services) : When set to ‘My Patients only’, the email is visible only to the doctor’s patients.
      • Private(None can see) : When set to Private, only the doctor can view the email.
    6. A doctor can delete an email address. To do so, click “Delete” from the three dots menu on the right corner.
    7. Jaldee.com uses the email address to communicate the general notifications to the doctor, such as notifications on invoice, Jaldee coupons, discounts, etc.
    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)

    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    LANGUAGES KNOWN
    A doctor can add multiple languages known to him/her. This can widen the patient base and attract more patients.
    1. Initially, to add a language, a doctor has to click on “Add it Now”.
    2. The languages added in the section are displayed here.
    3. To choose from the list of languages, click on the “Pencil” button to edit.
    4. The doctor should check the languages that he/she wants to use while communicating with the patients and uncheck the languages that are not preferred.
    5. Click “Save” to retain the information.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - NO   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    ADDITIONAL INFO
    Following is the list of additional information for the Health sector. A doctor needs to fill in the details for each section. This is to let the patients know more about the business as well as the doctor.
    Dentists/Alternate Medicine Practitioner
    1.Educational Qualification
    Here the doctor needs to mention the educational qualification(Ex. MBBS/MS/MD). Also enter the name of board or university.
    SEARCHABLE-YES VIEWABLE-YES
    2.Membership/Associations
    Here a doctor should mention his/her memberships/associations with other organizations (Ex. IMA).
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    3.MCI Number
    Mention your MCI number here.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    4.Gender
    Male/Female/Others
    SEARCHABLE-YES VIEWABLE-YES
    5.Associated Clinics
    Here a doctor can mention the names of other clinics that are associated with the doctor
    SEARCHABLE-YES VIEWABLE-YES
    6.Medical Problems
    The doctor needs to mention the medical conditions in which he/she specializes (Ex. Diabetes).
    SEARCHABLE-YES VIEWABLE-YES
    7.Symptoms
    Here a doctor enters the symptoms of the medical condition (Ex. Unexpected Weight Loss).
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    8.Treatments
    Here the doctor can mention the treatments available for the medical condition (Ex. Medication/Diet/Exercise).
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    9.Medical Procedures
    The doctor can mention the medical procedures and tests available for the medical condition (Ex. Insulin).
    SEARCHABLE-YES VIEWABLE-YES
    10.Experience
    Enter the Work Experience here (Ex. 10 Years).
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    11.Awards & Recognitions
    Here a doctor can mention the awards received in the respective field.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    12.Reference URL
    Give the direct link of the doctor’s own website. Also mention the other sites where the doctor profile is listed.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    13.Medical Insurance Supported
    Mention here the medical insurance supported.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    14.Facilities
    Choose from the list of facilities available in your hospital.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    15.Departments
    Choose from the list of departments in your hospital.
    SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    16.Government Hospital
    Enable the toggle button, if the hospital is government undertaking. SEARCHABLE-NO VIEWABLE-YES
    GALLERY
    Image and Photos seize the patient’s attention and make a profile more engaging. Doctors are suggested to add service or specialization related images to the profile. This will increase patients’ attention. Gallery section has view options and add multiple images option. All the added images are shown here.
    How to add a new image?
    1. To add an image, click “Add it Now” and upload the images here. The doctor also needs to write a caption for the image in the image’s caption box.
    2. To add more images in the collection, click on the “(+)” symbol.
    3. Supported images file types: jpg, jpeg, bmp, png, gif.
    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA
    A doctor can connect his/her Jaldee profile with the social media profiles. These social media icons are displayed on the profile. This option allows patients to view the doctor’s social media profile, such as Facebook, Twitter, etc.
    1. To add social media links to the Jaldee profile, click “Add It Now”.
    2. If the profile has already been linked to the social media, a doctor can add more or edit the existing links by clicking on the “(+)”.
    3. Select any of the following social media sites from the drop-down list and enter the URL which will redirect the page to the profile in respective sites. Choose “Save” to retain the information.
    • Facebook
    • Twitter
    • Youtube
    • LinkedIn
    • Google
    • Pinterest
    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that patients can search for the doctor using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that patients can only view the attributes in doctors profile in search results.)
    CUSTOM BUSINESS ID
    A custom business id is a unique id that redirects to a doctor’s detailed profile page in Jaldee . You can add a custom URL based on things like your hospital name, username used in Jaldee or anything of your choice. You can share this custom URL to your patients in your website or any other portal. To add a custom url, make sure your license package is upgraded to Ruby.

    How to add a custom business id in Jaldee?
    • Initially to add a custom business id click“Add It Now".
    • Enter a valid custom business id keeping in line with the following guidelines:
      1. Minimum 4 characters.
      2. Maximum 25 characters
      3. Can have alphabets and numbers.
      4. Only '-' symbol is allowed.
      5. No white spaces allowed.
    • Click “Ok” to save the custom business id.
    • The new custom business id is added and when you click the added custom business id from here,it will be redirected to the detailed page of your profile.
    • You can edit or delete the custom business id already added. To do so click the three dots menu on the right side.
    Check-in Manager
    The Check-in manager helps the doctor in managing the working hours and ensuring the seamless workflow from the point of the check-in to the completion of service.
    Accept Online Check-in
    • Here, a doctor gets full control over online patient check-in.
    • Complete the “Profile & Summary” section with details. To do so, click on the “Profile” under Settings and enter the details. Once done, set Public Search to “ON”.
    • Afterward, a doctor can enable “Online Check-in”.
    • Doctor can choose two options:
      • Same day check-in : Check this button to accept check-ins for the same day.
      • Future check-in : Check this button to accept check-ins for a future date.
    • Walk-in check-ins are always enabled.
    Calculation of waiting time
    Waiting time simply refers to the time a patient has to wait before he/she can avail the services offered at the premise.
    • Automatic (Machine Learning) : Using a machine learning algorithm, the system automatically calculates the turnaround time for each service by analyzing a doctor’s service history.
    • Manual : Using this option, a doctor can fix a wait time which will be applied to all the check-ins (for example, If a doctor sets 10 minutes of manual time, by default all the patients will get 10 minutes of waiting time.) Manual time should be used when a doctor can guarantee to serve all the patients in the given time. To do so, it is advisable that the doctor is equipped with enough resources. An additional option is available for doctors choosing “Manual” wait time calculation. He/She can edit individual check-ins wait time from the check-in details in doctor dashboard.
    • Token System(Do not show waiting time for patients) : If a doctor chooses this option, then all the patients will receive and see a token number instead of any waiting time.
    • No Token : If a doctor chooses this option, the patients won’t be able to see the waiting time as well as the token number. Here a patient can see the number of persons ahead of him/her.
    Send Notification
    If a doctor wants to receive notification in Jaldee Provider App, when a check-in is done or when a check-in is cancelled, he/she needs to turn on this toggle button.
    Accept Future Check-In
    • This advanced feature of Jaldee.com helps a doctor accept check-ins online for a service that will be availed in a future date.
    • If a doctor enables this button, online check-in patients can avail the services for a future date.
    • In case a doctor disables“Accept Future Check-in”, patients can only check-in for the current day’s working hours.
    LOCATIONS
    • The information related to the business location comes under this section.
    • This page prompts a doctor to “Add new location”, in case he/she has not added any location during the initial profile set up.
    • “Add new location” allows the doctor to add a new location for the enterprise.
      1. When the doctor clicks on this button, a location window pops up where one can select a location on the map.
      2. Click “Yes I’m Done” after choosing a location in the map, then enter location name and rest of the fields will be filled automatically. If one cannot find the new location in the map, the doctor will be required to manually enter the location details in the respective fields.
      3. In Working Hours the doctor is required to add time schedule (Please refer Working Hours section below) and click on “Save” to add the new location.
      4. Click “Save” to submit all the information.
    • The location details entered during the time of the profile activation process is by default set as the base location of the business.
    • Multiple locations that are added in the profile is displayed here
    • To set a particular location as the base location, click on the three dots menu in the right corner of the location name and click “Set as Base Location”.
    • The doctor can make any added location open/close to patients. To close a location for patients, click on the “Disable” button from the three dots menu in the right corner of the location name.
    • Click on the location name to view the details of a location including the location amenities and working hours.
    • The doctor can also edit the location and location amenities of the enterprise.
    • Working hours (please refer Working Hours section below) of a selected location is displayed in the bottom of the page.
    • Multiple activities related to the Working Hours such as adding another working hours, editing the existing working hour, enabling/disabling the working hours can be done by clicking on the three dots menu.
    SERVICES
    This page lists all the services offered to the patients. While listing the services, please keep the name of services simple and comprehensible which will help the patients easily know more about the services offered by the clinic.
    • When the doctor clicks on the “Services”, a page appears where one can view a service by default name “Consultation”(If doctor has edited the default service during the initial profile set up, the updated service details is seen here). Other details such as Estimated duration, End of Service notification fields also have values by default. The doctor can edit this section by clicking on the pencil button.
    • Tax Applicable field can be set to “Yes”, only if tax settings is completed under the Payments section in Settings.
    • Service status is enabled by default. Only enabled services are available for patients to proceed with the check-in process.
    • The doctor, at his/her convenience, can enable/disable the status of any service by clicking on the three dots menu.
    • All the services created are displayed here.
    • To view the complete details of a service, click on the service names. One can edit the details only if the status of service is set to enabled. In the detailed view, the doctor can enable or disable the service’s status.
    • No price is set for any default service created. The doctor can input the price in the specified field.
    • “Add Service” button enables the doctor to add a new service to the profile. When a doctor clicks this button, a service window pops up where one can input the service details.
      • Service Name : Enter the name of the service.
      • Briefly describe service : Provide a brief explanation of the service that is being offered.
      • Estimated Duration (min) : Enter the minimum time (in minutes) required to complete the mentioned service.
      • Price : Enter the price of the mentioned service.
      • Enable Prepayment : A doctor can enable the prepayment option. To accept payment in advance before checking in for the offered services, enable this option. Prepayment option can be enabled only when the payment settings are completed (Settings -> Payments).
      • Tax Applicable : If a doctor has enabled the Tax application button, he/she can collect a certain percentage of tax from the patients (the percentage of tax can be set under Tax settings). This option can be enabled only if the Tax settings are already set.
      • End of Service Notification : When a doctor enables the notification button, two options, viz, Push messages and Email appear. A doctor can select any of these media to pass a message to the patients informing that the service has been completed.
      • Gallery : Multiple images of the service are added here.
    • Click on “Save” after adding all the information. A success window appears informing that the service has been added successfully and will ask to add this service to the relevant working hours.
    • A newly added services will be displayed to the patients, only if the service has been added to any existing/new working hours. This can also be edited by clicking on the pencil button.
    WORKING HOURS
    Working Hours simply means the active time of the business. One can add multiple Working Hours according to the business schedule. To understand this with an example, suppose a business works from Monday to Friday (9 am to 5 pm) whereas, on Weekends (i.e. Saturday and Sunday), it operates only for 4 hours (9 am to 1 pm). In such cases, one can create two working hours, one for weekdays and the other one for the Weekends.
    • This page prompts to “Add working hours”, in case the doctor has not added any working hour during the initial profile set up.
    • “ADD WORKING HOURS” button enables the doctor to add new working hours. When a doctor clicks this button a window appears where one can input the details of the schedule.
      • Working Hours : Enter a title for the working hours here.
      • Location : Choose a location from the drop-down menu.
      • Service : All added services offered by the doctor are displayed here. Check the services offered in this working hour from the list of services displayed here.
      • Schedule : Select the days according to the schedule. A doctor has the option to choose “Select all days”, in case the business is open 24*7.
      • Start Time/End Time : Enter the start time and the end time for a particular working hour.
      • Maximum patients served : Enter the maximum number of patients the business can serve in particular schedule. No more check-ins will be accepted, once the limit is reached. If the limit is not set, then endless check-ins will be accepted between the working hours.
      • Patients served at a time : Here enter the number of patients that can be served at the same time.
      • Online check-ins : Enable this toggle button to make this particular working hours available for patients to check-in online for the same day.
      • Future check-ins : Enable this toggle button to make this particular working hours available for patients to check-in online for a future date.
    • All added working hours are displayed here.
    • The status of working hours can be enabled/disabled. The enabled working hours are open to patients for the check-in process.
    • Doctors can enable or disable same day online check-in or future check-in anytime from here.
    • To edit or to enable/disable any particular working hour, click on the three dots menu.
    • Also “Show Checkins Count” is available in the three dots menu, to see the number of check-ins for Today, Future and Tomorrow.
    • When the doctor clicks on the enabled working hours, it displays a brief outlook of the time schedule.
    • To edit the timing of this particular working hours, click on the pencil button given in the right corner.
    • A working hour window appears where the fields show current data. Edit the sections and click on the “Save” button to retain the modified data.
    My Availability Today(+)
    In Jaldee, if doctor is available to provide services to patients other than the available working hours, he/she can create an instant working hour for a time period other than the saved working hours. Step by step instructions to add an instant working hour in Jaldee:
    • Click on (+) symbol, adjacent to the label “My Availability Today”.
    • Edit the time period you are available to offer services.
    • Check the services listed, you wish to offer during this instant working hour. If all services are offered, check the All Services checkbox.
    • Option to edit maximum patients served and patients served at a time, is available.
    • Finally, click “MAKE ME AVAILABLE” button to create an instant queue.
    • Now patient check-ins can be accepted for this instant queue.
    DEPARTMENTS
    A corporate structure consists of various departments which performs specific functions while constantly collaborating with each other to achieve specific goals. In Jaldee, doctor can add in departments and can allow patient check-ins department wise. How to add a department?
    • Initially, click “Add Department” button.
    • Enter the department name, department id and give a brief description.
    • Click “Save” to add the department.
    • Most importantly, add available services to each department.
    • The added departments are listed here. doctor can enable or disable added departments from three dots menu.
    • To edit department details, click on the department name.
    • To allow patients to check-in department wise enable the toggle button “Select services by department” from check-in manager.
    Check In
    • A doctor can create and check-in a patient for service.
    • To search for a patient and to check whether he/she has already been registered with Jaldee, the doctor can use the patient’s mobile number, his/her first name/last name.
    • In case, the patient’s data does not exist in the Jaldee database, the doctor can input the details of the patient and get him/her registered with Jaldee.com.
    • In the check-in/get token window, first, select the service from the drop-down menu that a patient wishes to avail. In case, the doctor has only one default service, then there will be no drop-down menu.
    • Check-in/Get Token window has a feature to add or change a family member whom the patient wishes to do a check-in for. Click “Add/Change Member” to add a new member with the first name and the last name. In case the family member is already added, it can be directly selected from the list of members.
    • If a patient has any note, the doctor can click “If you have a note, Click here (+)” to write the message in the textbox.
    • With all this information the doctor can now proceed with the check-in process of the walk-in patient by clicking on “Confirm Check-in".
    • Push message will be sent to the patient’s mobile and an email notification to the registered email address regarding the information of check-in.
    • Future Check-in can be done in the same way as that of Check-in. The only difference between these check-ins is that the doctor needs to select a date of check-ins in the Future Check-in.
    Create Patient
    • A doctor can create a patient profile.
    • The first step is that of the Search Process. To search for a patient in the Jaldee database, enter the patient’s mobile number and the first 3 letters of the patient’s first name/last name.
    • In case the patient’s information does not exist in the Jaldee database, the doctor can input the patient details and get him/her registered with Jaldee.
    KIOSK
    The Jaldee Kiosk feature allows a doctor to place a Tablet/PC/Laptop/Other Machines which is self-operated. This provides the patients an easier and more interactive way to check-in themselves for the services offered by the business. KIOSK is available to doctors who has chosen license packages Ruby or Diamond.
    How it works?
    The KIOSK feature is designed for walk-in patients. With this feature, the walk-in patients can self-check-in for the services, sign up to Jaldee and view the status of the check-in.
    1. Check-In Yourself
      2. A patient can walk-in to any open Kiosk. The Kiosk prompts the patient to enter the mobile number and the first three letters of their first name/last name. This is to look up if the patient is already registered with Jaldee.
      • If the patient is already a registered member, he/she can check-in online for the offered services.
      • If the patient is not a registered member, he/she can register with Jaldee. To do so, the patient has to input his/her name and then he/she can proceed with the check-in process.
      • In the check-in window, first, select the service from the drop-down menu. If the doctor has only one default service, then there will be no drop-down menu.
      • Check-in window has a feature to add or change a family member for whom the patient wishes to do the check-in. To do so, click “Add/Change Member”. In case the member is already added in the list, the patient can search for the member with the first and last name.
      • A patient has the option to add a note if any. To do so, click “If you have a note, Click here (+)” and write the message in the textbox.
      • With all this information, a patient can proceed with the check-in by clicking on the “Confirm Check-in”.
      • At the time of completion of the check-in process through the Kiosk, the status of check-in changes to “Arrived”.
      • Push notification regarding the completion of the check-in process is sent to the patient’s registered mobile number.
      • Future Check-in is done in the same way as that of normal check-in. The only difference here in Future check-in is to select the date.
        • Note: A patient is restricted only to the above-mentioned information. The patient cannot access any other information about the service doctor’s Jaldee account.
    2. Checked-in Online Check Your Status/Report as Arrived
      • A patient (who has already checked-in online) can view the status of the check-in by entering the mobile number and name.
      • The window shows the status of the patient’s check-in along with the estimated waiting time or token number with persons ahead. If the patient has arrived at the business premise, he/she can mark their status to Arrived by clicking on the “Confirm Arrival”.
    3. Do You Want to Sign Up?
      4. The patients can sign up to Jaldee through the KIOSK machine under this option. To do so, simply enter the mobile number, first name, and last name. This will get the patient registered with Jaldee.
      • A patient can also register themselves with Jaldee and proceed with the check-in.
      • The initial step is the search process. With the mobile number and first name/last name of the patient, one can search the Jaldee database for the patient’s existence in the record.
    • A doctor is granted a selected license at the time of initial sign up. This allows a doctor to use Jaldee services for a specific period of time.
      • Following are the offered licenses:
        • Free : This is free of cost. With the unlimited public search, a doctor gets 20 business profile views per day(30 per month), 20 transactions per day(30 transactions per month) and Jaldee Pay under free license package.
        • Silver : Under Silver license, a doctor needs to pay Rs 499/month to get 20 business profile views per day(300 per month) with unlimited public search, 30 transactions per day(300 transactions per month), Jaldee verification and other features same as that in FREE license package.
        • Gold : Under Gold license, a doctor needs to pay Rs 1499/month to get 50 business profile views per day(1000 per month) with unlimited public search, 50 transactions per day(500 transactions per month) and in addition to Silver package features, Gold package gets 2 Jaldee Keywords.
        • Platinum : Under Platinum license, a doctor needs to pay Rs 2999/month to get 125 business profile views per day(2000 per month) with unlimited public search, 100 transactions per day(1000 transactions per month) and in addition to Gold package features, Platinum package gets 5 Jaldee Keywords and most importantly the corporate integration feature.
        • Ruby : Under Ruby license, a doctor needs to pay Rs 5999/month to get 300 business profile views per day(5000 per month) with unlimited public search, 250 transactions per day(2500 transactions per month) and in addition to Platinum package features, Ruby package gets 10 Jaldee Keywords, Jaldee Coupons and Custom URL.
        • Diamond : Diamond license package grant a wide range of features in Jaldee. Under Diamond license, a doctor needs to pay Rs 7999/month to get unlimited business profile views per day with unlimited public search, 1000 transactions per day(10000 transactions per month) and in addition to Ruby package features, Diamond package gets 25 Jaldee Keywords.
    • To view the current license package and related information, click on the “License & Invoice” under “Settings”.
    • To understand the features of Jaldee and how it works, a doctor can opt for free Platinum - FREE Trial 60Days.
    • Jaldee under the license package “Platinum - FREE Trial 60Days” has all attributes as that of “Platinum” license package.
    • This trial continues for the next two months. In order to continue availing the Jaldee services, ensure to upgrade the license package before the trial period ends. Failed to do so will result in the license package being upgraded to “FREE”.
    • An alert message will be sent one week before the package expires.
    • The Free license package is free of cost with limited features.
    Upgrade License:
    Here a doctor can upgrade the license anytime.
    • When the doctor clicks on the “Upgrade License” button, a window appears where a drop-down menu is listed with the available license packages.
    • To upgrade to a license package, select a package from the drop-down menu.
    • The license package has a monthly subscription, i.e. monthly payment has to be done.
    • A doctor can also upgrade the license package using the below links from dashboard:
      • Click here to Upgrade License : If license package is Platinum Free 60 days trial.
      • Upgrade License Now : If license package is Basic or higher.
    • Here, a doctor can view the owned license package, due amount as well as the next payment date.
    • An invoice is generated on a monthly basis.
    • For example, if a doctor has created a profile on 10th January then all invoices will be generated on a monthly basis i.e. on 10th of each month. In case, the doctor buys add-on and Jaldee-keywords on a different date (suppose on 20th January), the first bill of the add-on and Jaldee-keywords will be calculated from 20 January - 10 February. After that, the same “10↔10” bill cycle will continue from next month. This billing cycle will include License and Addon amount in a single invoice until the license or Add-on gets upgraded/downgraded.

      *To downgrade the existing license package, a doctor needs to contact the Jaldee team, call us on 0487-2325650 or you can send us an email at support@jaldee.com.
    • An invoice is generated when an addon is included in a subscription using “ADD-ON(+)” option.
    • When a doctor click on the “Pay” button (Silver and Higher grades), he/she can see the generated invoices. To proceed with payment from here, click on “Make Payment”. This redirects the page to PayU interface and thus proceed with the actual payment.
    • The doctor will receive a confirmation email informing the payment status.
    • A doctor can see all the payments completed so far in the “Payments History” section.
    • The invoice is generated every month on the same date of profile creation, whether or not the previous payment is made.
    • The license gets upgraded as soon as a doctor clicks on license upgrade button, but the invoice gets generated from the next month and the amount is calculated based on the daily usage of the license package.
    • An email will be sent to the doctor upon each invoice generation.

    Jaldee Pricing

    Licensable metrics FREE Silver Gold Platinum (Free 60 days trial) Ruby Diamond
    Price(Rs/Month) FREE 499 Rs 1499 Rs 2999 Rs 5999 Rs 7999 Rs
    Jaldee Business Listing

    Number of Transactions 20 per day 30 per day 50 per day 100 per day 250 per day 1000 per day

    Kiosk

    Guaranteed business value protection NA NA Yes Yes Yes Yes

    Jaldee verification

    The three dots menu in the top right corner of the page has the following options:
    1. License Change History
    The license change history shows the list of the changes applied in the license package. Here a doctor can see the starting date of the current license package, it’s expiry date (only if upgraded to higher grades), and the status of the license package either active or expired. A doctor can also downgrade the license via Jaldee support. The effects of this on the bill is reflected from the next bill cycle (next month) onwards.
    2. License Usage
    Here a doctor can track the license usage. This section shows the following information:
    • Number of business profile views : This refers to the number of patients who have clicked for a detailed view of the doctor.
    • Transactions : This refers to the number of check-ins.
    • Profile gallery storage : This shows the total storage space given to the doctor under the availed license package.
    • Jaldee-Keyords : This shows the total number of Jaldee-Keyords allowed for the availed package.
    A doctor also gets to know whether the usages are in compliance with the current license package. The data until yesterday is updated here.
    3. Payment History
    Here a doctor can view the entire history of the payments done to Jaldee so far.
    Add-on
    Add-ons are used when a license package reaches its maximum limit and a doctor wants to add more features. With the help of add-ons, a doctor can avail additional features without upgrading the license. Add-ons are charged accordingly.
    Following are the list of add-ons:
    Storage per month
    • 50MB for Rs 50 per month
    • 250MB for Rs 100 per month
    • 1GB for rs 250 per month
    Keywords
    • Pack of 5 keywords for Rs 250 per month
    • Pack of 20 keywords for Rs 1000 per month
    *Note: Add-on deletion is possible only via Jaldee support. Once it is deleted, its effect on the bill can be seen from the next bill cycle onwards.
    Jaldee-Keyword
    Jaldee-Keyword is common keywords. A patient generally uses such keywords to search for a doctor. Buying relevant keywords that a prospective patient would be searching on Jaldee. For example, if yours is an eye clinic, you can buy Jaldee-Keywords like “optometrist”, “eye doctor” etc.
    How to add an Jaldee-Keyword ?
    Different number of Jaldee-Keyword is available for different license packages. These are listed below:
    LICENSE PACKAGE Jaldee-Keywords
    FREE 0
    SILVER 0
    GOLD 2
    PLATINUM 5
    RUBY 10
    DIAMOND 25
    • All the available Jaldee-Keyword for the current license package are shown below the Jaldee-Keywords label.
    • To insert the keywords for your business click on the “+” symbol. Enter the keywords in the window and choose “Save”.
    • Here a doctor can view the already added Jaldee-Keyword. The option to delete the Jaldee-Keyword is available.
    • In case the current license package does not support any free Jaldee-Keyword or the doctor wants to add more Jaldee-Keyword than a license package offers, one can buy Jaldee-Keyword as Addon. Addon packages (5,20) are listed along with the pricing.
    Adjust Delay
    Delay can be caused by any reason. This interferes with the smooth functioning of the business. Adjust delay helps the doctor to set a delay to the current or earliest working hour.
    1. Select a working hour from the dashboard to adjust the delay.
    2. Click on the "Adjust Delay" button. This opens a new window.
    3. Further, set the delayed time (in hours and minutes) in the Delay field.
    4. In case if the doctor wants to inform the patient about the delay, click "Send Message”. A default message will be sent to the patients informing that the wait time has been extended for some time along with the new estimated waiting time.
    5. The doctor can also send a personalized message. Enter the message in the given text box.
    6. Click the “Save” button to confirm the adjustments.
    NON WORKING DAY
    Non-Working Day allows the doctor to set up different Public holidays and other non-working days. Unless a holiday has been mentioned in this section, it will be assumed that the service is being provided during the working hours specified under the Working Hours. Here is how a doctor can update non-working days in Jaldee.
    1. Click “Add Non-Working Day” under Miscellaneous.
    2. Select the corresponding date of the holiday (use calendar).
    3. Enter the reason for the holiday.
    4. Next, enter the duration of non-working hours. Keep in mind that the start time cannot be a different time from the timing of the working hours.
    5. Before adding a non-working day, ensure to have no pending waitlists for the day’s working hours.
    6. Upon having all the information, click “Save” to add the holiday.
    7. Subsequently, to add more holidays, click “(+)”.
    8. The date, time, and reason for each non-working day are listed here.
    9. A provider can edit or delete a particular non-working day. To do so, click on the three dots menu given in the right corner.
    PROVIDER DASHBOARD
    The dashboard section lets the doctor manage and monitor the check-ins of a patient. Here a doctor can monitor the current check-ins (Today) and the future check-ins (Future). The patient's previous check-ins can be viewed in this section under the “History” tab. To view the details, click on the patient’s name. There are location and working hours to help the doctor monitor the details of check-ins in different windows.
    1. Today () - All the present day’s online and walk-in check-ins are listed here. The adjoined brackets display the number of check-ins.
    2. Future() - All the check-ins for future dates are listed here. The adjoined brackets display the number of future check-ins.
    3. History - All of the patient’s previous check-ins until a day before are listed here. To view the details click on the “date of check-in” or on the “name of the patient”. Actions can also be changed from here.
    Location Selection
    Here a doctor can select the exact location if multiple locations are available. The doctor can check the details of a particular check-in for a specific location. Note: A doctor needs to select the location of service while he/she checks-in a “walk-in” patient.
    Check-Ins
    • If the business has multiple locations, select the location and the working hour from the dashboard.
    • Here the doctor can see a list of patients who have checked in (Online or Walk-in ).
    • In some cases, a “cloud symbol” is prefixed to a name, it means that the patient has checked in online.
    • To view the check-in details of a patient, doctor can click on the name of the patient. Check-in history, communication history, and history of private notes are listed here. In addition to that, the user can cancel a patient’s check-in and inform this through Send Message. A doctor can add a private note for a patient using Add private note.
    • For “Manual” wait time calculation, the doctor can edit individual check-ins wait time from the check-in details.
    • Each of the patient’s Name, Wait Time and Service is displayed here.
    • The three dots menu in the right side of check-in has the following options:
      1. Send Message : Instantly type and send a message to the patient here. These messages can be seen in communication history anytime.
      2. Cancel check-in :
        • To cancel a patient’s check-in, click on ”Cancel Check-In”.
        • Patients are notified about the cancellation of Check-in through push message/email.
        • When a doctor clicks on “Cancel Check-In” a pop-up window appears which shows the reasons for cancellation of the check-in. Use the checkboxes to select from the suggested reasons and then click “Save”.
        • The doctor can inform the patient about the cancellation. To do this, click on the Send Message button. A text box will appear with a default message for each reason, doctor can either send the default message or can edit and type a personalized message.
      3. Add private note : In case the doctor wants to keep a personal note about a particular patient, he/she can write and add a note here. This note can be seen anytime the patient checks-in again with the doctor under “Private Notes”.
      4. Change Status to Check-in : The option to check-in a patient appears only when the patient’s status is “Arrived”. The doctor can change the status back to “Check-in” using this option. This can be used in the following circumstances:
        • When a patient gets cancelled for some reason and wanted to check-in again.
        • When a patient’s check-in status has been mistakenly changed to Arrived status.
         Actions
    The following are the main actions the doctor can perform:
    1. Arrived : This button is used when a patient arrives at the premise of the business location to avail the services. When a doctor clicks this button, an “Arrived” label gets adjoined to the name of the patient. In case of a walk-in or kiosk patient, the “Arrived” label is automatically adjoined as the patients are present at the premises. Service can now be started.
    2. Start : Click on “Start” when the service is started. This will move the patient’s entry to “Started” tab. This will lead to the activation of the other two buttons, namely, “Complete” and “Bill”. Click on these buttons as and when required.
    3. Complete :Click on the “Complete” tab after completion of the service. The check-in status of the patient changes to complete. This will move the patient’s entry to the “Completed” tab. The completed tab generates two actions, namely “Bill” & “Accept Payment”.
    4. Cancel :If the service gets cancelled for some reason, click on the “Cancel” tab. This will remove the patient’s check-in entry from the list.
    5. Bill :After the completion of the service, a bill gets generated. Click on the “Bill” tab to view the receipt. Here a doctor can add extra services or items in the bill. From the three dots menu, a doctor can also “Apply order discount”, “Apply coupon” & “Apply Jaldee coupon” to the bill. The bill can be settled either by JaldeePay or Pay by Cash or Others.
    6. Accept Payment :Click on “Accept Payment”“Accept Payment” tab to receive the payment for the services. This opens the generated Bill page. Once the patient pays the bill, a doctor can settle the bill by clicking on the “Settle” tab.
         Started
    • Under this tab, a doctor can view the list of patients who have already started availing the service. The check-in tab will no longer contain these patients entry.
    • Name, Wait Time and Service will be the same as that in the check-ins tab.
    • Two actions are available here:
    1. Complete : Click on the “Complete” button after the completion of the service. This will move the patient’s entry from Started tab to the Completed tab. In case the “End of Service Notification” button is enabled in the “Add Service”, a push message or email will be sent to the patient, thus informing them about the service completion.
    2. Bill : A “Bill” button appears when a service is started. This opens the bill generated for the service. Click on “Add Service/Item” in order to add more services or items to the bill before proceeding with the payment. The three dots menu near this button has the following options:
      • Apply Jaldee Coupon : These coupons have been provided by Jaldee.
      • Apply Coupon : These are coupons generated by doctor.
      • Apply Order Discount : These discounts are offered by the doctor.
        • *The option to Add Private Note and Patient Note is available here.
      • These coupons are applied to the total bill amount.
      • Discounts can either be applied to the Gross amount or to each item.
      • Three dots menu near service/item in the bill has the following actions:
        1. Change Quantity : Here a doctor can change the quantity of the item or service already added to the bill.
        2. Apply Discount : Here a doctor can apply a discount to the bill.
        3. Remove Service/Item : Click here to remove a service or item from the bill.
    • Additionally the option to “Add Private Note”, “Send Message”, and “Change Status to Check-in” is also available.
      1. Add Private Note : Write a note about a particular patient here.
      2. Send Message : Write text to the patient here and send it to the patient. All of the sent messages can be seen in communication history anytime.
      3. Change Status to check-in :The option to check-in a patient appears only if the patient’s status is marked to “Arrived”. A doctor can change the status back to “Check-in” using this option. This can be used in the following circumstances:
        • When a patient gets cancelled for some reason and wanted to check-in again.
        • When a patient’s check-in status has been mistakenly changed to “Arrived” status.
    • Payment Status: This shows the payment status (not paid, partially paid, or fully paid) of the patient.
    • Patient Note: When a patient adds any note while checking-in, it is displayed here.
         Completed
    • Once a service is done click on”Complete” button, the patient’s entry will move under the “Completed” tab.
    • The doctor is equipped with the following actions in this section:
      1. Accept Payment : Click on this button to view the saved bill. A doctor has the option to either continue with the payment procedure or to edit the bill by adding new services or items to the bill. The bill has the following options:
        • Settle Bill : Click on this button to settle the bill. The due amount in the bill is also visible in the patient dashboard.
        • Jaldee Pay : This enables the patient to pay online by generating the bill to the patient dashboard also.
        • Pay by cash or others : This enables the patient to complete the bill settlement either in cash or by other means.
    • Additionally the options “Add Private Note” and “Send Message” are also available.
      1. Add Private Note : Write a note about a particular patient here.
      2. Send Message : Write text to the patient here and send it to the patient. All of the sent messages can be seen in communication history anytime.
         Cancelled
    • Here the doctor can view the list of all cancelled patient check-ins.
    • The three dot menu available has the following options:
      • Add Private Note : Write a note about a particular patient here.
      • Send Message : Write text to the patient here and send it to the patient. All of the sent messages can be seen in communication history anytime.
      • Change Status to check-in : The option to check-in a patient appears only if the patient’s status is marked to “Arrived”. A doctor can change the status back to “Check-in” using this option.
    PAYMENTS
    In this section, a doctor can select the payment mode with which he/she wishes to accept/settle payments.
    • To enable online payments using any payment system, a doctor has to switch on the “Patients Self pay” mode. Initially, this is set to off mode.
    • If a doctor has not entered an email address before, click on the link “Go To Email Settings” (Payment Settings) to add the email id. This can be set directly from My Account.
      • Payment Settings
    • Two modes of payments can be enabled. These are:
      • Jaldee Bank : Jaldee account means a patient can pay online for the services directly to the Jaldee Bank and in turn, the Jaldee team will reimburse the amount (charging a commission for each transaction) to the doctor. Jaldee bank is available for online payment. Upto Silver license package, only Jaldee bank is available for online payments. However, the doctors with higher license packages (from Gold onwards) may or may not opt for the Jaldee bank for online payment.
      • My Own Bank Account : In this section, a doctor is required to submit the account details of Paytm/CC/DC/Net Banking. In case the doctor has not added an email address, click on the link “Go To Email Settings” (Payment Settings) to add the email address. Furthermore, a doctor needs to click on any mode of payment (with which he/she wants to settle the bill). The mode of payment can be either “Paytm" or “CC/DC/Net Banking” or both.
        • Paytm : This is an effortless mode of online payment commonly used these days. If the doctor has a Paytm account, he/she needs to provide the following details:
          • Mobile Number
          • Merchant Id
          • Merchant Key
        • CC/Dc/Net Banking : To settle the bill using this mode of payment, a doctor has to provide the following information:
          • Account Holder Name
          • Bank Account Number
          • Pan Card Number
          • Bank Name
          • IFSC Code
          • Name on Pan Card
          • Branch Name
          • Business Filing Status
          • Account Type
    • To verify the Paytm/CC/DC/Net Banking and to start accepting digital payments, please call the Jaldee team on 0487-2325650 or mail us to support@jaldee.com.
    Billing/POS
    Billing/POS page is the one-stop-shop for adding items, discounts, coupons and tax settings. Discounts and coupons play a major role in driving patients toward a service. Jaldee gives flexibility and ease of adding items and providing discounts or coupons to patients. This is only available from Platinum License package.
    • A doctor can add/remove the item, service, discounts, and coupons anytime in the bill. The changes in the bill will be reflected immediately.
    • A doctor can settle the bill only after the full amount is paid (either by paying the full amount, or applying discount/coupon/on demand discount).
    • Once settled a bill cannot be updated. The settled bill can be emailed.
    Items
    Under Items a doctor can create and publish a list of items that are being sold at the clinic. To add a new item, click “Add Item”. A new window appears where the doctor can insert the information regarding the item such as its name, price, a short description, and a detailed description. If the item is taxable, the doctor is required to enable the “Taxable” toggle button (the percentage of tax can be set in tax settings). This can be enabled only if the Tax settings is already set. Click “Submit” when all the information is filled. The doctor can always change the quantity of the service or item in the bill. The changes will be reflected right away in the bill. This is only available from Platinum License package.
    Discounts
    To add a discount for the first time, click “Discounts”. Here the doctor needs to enter the discount name, its type (Percentage/Fixed), and provide a description to the discount along with the value in Rupees. The discounts can be applied to the total bill as well as to each item and service. A doctor can set up two types of Discounts:
    1. Fixed Amount: A specified amount will be deducted from either the total amount or from each specified item/service in the bill.
    2. Percentage: A specific percentage of the total amount from the invoice or from each item will be deducted in this case. “Percentage” type discounts can be applied either to the total amount on the invoice or to each specified item/service in the bill.
    The discount dashboard shows all the existing discounts that have been created in Jaldee settings. Discount name, value, and description of each discount is visible here. A doctor can create, delete and edit the discount. For creating more discounts, click on “(+)” symbol. * Note: On Demand Discount is created during the account creation and its price is set to zero by default. It can only be applied to the total bill. It can be viewed under discounts list, right after the account creation. Its price cannot be updated. It can be used to waive the bill amount. At the time of bill updation, the doctor can give any amount of on-demand discount by selecting this discount.
    Coupons
    This section is divided into two main sections, viz. Jaldee Coupons and My Coupons. Coupons, either Jaldee coupons or My Coupons can only be applied to the total bill amount.
    1. Jaldee Coupons :
      • The coupons provided by Jaldee are listed here. Each coupon has a code, name, validity date (from and to), status. The option to enable/disable the coupon is also available in the three dots menu.
      • The coupons with no three dots menu are enabled by the Jaldee. The doctor has no option to enable/disable the coupon.
      • To view the details of a particular coupon, click on the coupon code.
      • In the detailed view, the doctor can see the valid dates, discount value or percentage, rules, and the coupon stats as well.
      Following are the rules for each coupon. “✅” or “❌” indicates whether the rules are applicable or not.
      1. Always Enabled : This coupon will always be enabled. A doctor has no option over enabling or disabling these coupons.
      2. Default Enabled : This coupon is enabled by default, but its status can be changed by the doctor.
      3. Online Check in Required : This coupon is available only for those patients who check-in online.
      4. Self Payment Required : This coupon is available only for those patients who pay online for the services.
      5. Combine with Other Coupons : This coupon can be used with other available coupons.
      6. First Check-in Only : This coupon is available only for those patients who checks-in for the first time on Jaldee.
      7. First Check-in Per Provider Only : This coupon is available only for those patients who check-in for the first time for a particular doctor.
      8. Consumer Use Limit Per Provider : This refers to the number of limited patients on whom a doctor can apply the coupon.
      9. Minimum Bill Amount : This refers to the minimum bill amount to which the coupon can be applied.
      10. Consumer Use Limit : This refers to the number of times a patient can apply the coupon.
      11. Provider Use Limit : This refers to the number of times a doctor can apply the coupon.
      • Here a doctor can view the terms and conditions as well as the doctor description for the coupon.
      • Corresponding patient description is displayed to him/her at their dashboard.
      • Coupon status is visible in the bottom of the page. The doctor has the option to enable/disable the coupon here (only if permitted).
      • In addition, a coupon stat section is given where the following is shown:
        1. Check ins Applied : This shows the number of times check-ins applied for the coupon.
        2. Total Amount Discounted : This shows the total amount waived to the patients by the doctor using the coupon.
        3. Amount Reimbursed by Jaldee.com : This shows the amount given to the doctor by Jaldee.
    2. My Coupons These coupons are created by doctors. To add a coupon for the first time click “Add Coupon”. Here enter the name of the coupon, type of the coupon (Percentage/Fixed) and provide a brief description to the discount. A coupon can only be applied to the total bill. A doctor can set up two types of Coupons:
      1. Fixed Amount: A specified amount will be deducted from the total bill.
      2. Percentage: A specific percentage of the amount from the total bill will be deducted in this case. “Percentage” type coupons can be applied to the total bill.
      The Coupons dashboard shows all the existing coupons that have been created on the profile. Here a doctor can create, delete and edit a coupon. To create more coupons, click on the “(+)” symbol.
    Tax Settings
    Before setting up the taxes, ensure that one is familiar with the tax requirements of one’s business. The following instructions will help the doctor through the tax setup of the business services in Jaldee:
    • When the doctor clicks on the tax settings under the Billing/PoS section, a window appears. The doctor is required to fill the textbox (Enter the GST number of the business and the tax percentage for the respective sector here).
    • At first, enter the GST number of the business.
    • Next, enter the Tax Percentage.
    • After the complete insertion of the details, click “Save”.
    • This tax will be applied to the services offered and the items that are being sold at the time of billing, only if the “Tax Applicable” toggle button is enabled in the respective section (i.e. Settings -> Check-in Manager ->Services).
    • Jaldee has no role in paying taxes paid by the patient to the doctor. All types of taxes are collected directly by the doctor, so it is the doctor’s responsibility to remit the taxes to the Government.
    DOCTOR’S PROFILE
    The doctor profile is a collection of settings and information associated with a business owner. The system creates a doctor profile at the time of registration. The profile contains information such as name, mobile, email, etc. Jaldee doctor profile has the following options:
    • My Account : Here lies the personal data of the service doctor. Option to edit the data is also available.
    • Change Password : Here the doctor can change the password keeping in line with the following guidelines:
      • Minimum 8 characters
      • Maximum 32 characters
      • Must have at least one uppercase letter and one digit.
    • Change Mobile : Enter a new mobile number and click on Submit. To verify the mobile number, enter the OTP sent to the number.
    • Switch to Consumer : When a doctor profile is created in Jaldee.com, a corresponding client profile also gets created automatically for the same doctor. From here, the doctor can easily switch to the clients dashboard.
    • Logout : One can log out of the account here.
    DOWN PANEL OPTIONS
    • My Account : Here lies the personal data of the service doctor. Option to edit the data is also available.
    • Change Password : Here the doctor can change the password keeping in line with the following guidelines:
      • Minimum 8 characters
      • Maximum 32 characters
      • Must have at least one uppercase letter and one digit.
    • Change Mobile : Enter a new mobile number and click on Submit. To verify the mobile number, enter the OTP sent to the number.
    • Switch to Consumer : When a doctor profile is created in Jaldee.com, a corresponding client profile also gets created automatically for the same doctor. From here, the doctor can easily switch to the clients dashboard.
    • Logout : One can log out of the account here.
    PROFILE AND SEARCH SETTINGS
    The profile & search settings offers an in-depth overview of a provider's profile. This would help customers make informed decisions and choose a relevant provider. The dashboard will display every new detail updated by the provider, keeping customers aware of all changes occurring in the service.

    PUBLIC SEARCH
    1. A provider is required to click on the “TURN ON” button to enable the Public Search if he/she wants to be visible in the customer’s search results.
    2. If a provider has disabled the Public Search, customers cannot see the provider’s profile in their search results.
    3. Customers can search for a provider with any attributes that are listed under the Profile and Search section. These attributes can include the business name, Jaldee verified levels, Jaldee-Keyword, Basic Information, Location, Location Amenities, Specialization, Languages Known, Additional Info.
    4. During the initial profile setup, a provider can proceed with setting the Profile Name & Summary, Location, Working Hours, Service and Public Search status. The provider can setup or update these informations here.
      • If the provider logs out of the website after setting the password, the account will not be active. To activate the account, the provider has to completely fill basic details and turn on the Public Search. At this point, a default service gets created which can be edited in Services under the Check-In Manager.
      • If the provider logs out of the website after setting up the location, a default service time window gets created. The provider can edit this from here.
    JALDEE VERIFIED LEVELS
    • After creating the profile, a provider becomes eligible to get their profile verified with Jaldee.
    • To verify your Jaldee account, call us on 0487-2325650 or you can send us an email at support@jaldee.com
    • Being verified by Jaldee allows customers to know that the provider has been through the Jaldee verification process and is successfully verified.
    • The verified provider in customer’s search results carries a flag with the profile name. Initially, the verification flag is set to none.
    • The priority of a provider in customer search results increases with the verification levels.
    • Jaldee has 3 verified levels, namely, Basic, Basic Plus, and Advanced. Details of each verified levels are depicted in the following table:
    Basic
  • Provide any two of the following Government ID proof with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
         Basic plus
  • Provide any two of the Government ID proof (with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
         Advanced
  • Provide any two of the Government ID proof (with photo)
    • Driving License
    • Voter’s ID
    • Aadhar Card
    • Passport
  • Mobile Number Verification
    • Jaldee team will call and verify the mobile number used for sign up process to which OTP was sent.
  • Profile Picture
    • Provide a sharp and clear profile pic.
  • Certificates
    • Submit a copy of educational certificates and business license to Jaldee team.
    • Provide two personal references. These two can’t be a family member and they should provide a valid phone number.
    • Should submit more pictures of the business or property.
  • Physical check (by Jaldee employees)
    • Jaldee team will visit the business or property directly.
    • The team will take the actual photograph of the business or property.
    • They will collect the exact GPS coordinates.
    • They will also collect the details of endorsement done by any celebrity or politician.
    IMPORTANT
    • Basic is free of cost.
    • If verification level is set to None, the provider will not receive any priority in customer’s search results.
    • A charge is applicable for Basic Plus and Advanced verified level.
    • For the verification process, providers can email the required documents to the Jaldee support team.
    • Safety of the document is our priority. Jaldee.com pledges to keep them safe.
    • These requirements are subject to change and refinement with prior notification to the providers.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)
    BASIC INFORMATION
    It displays the Basic information about a business given by the provider at the time of initial profile setup. The provider is allowed to edit each section under “Basic Information”. To increase the customer acquisition fill this section with appropriate details.
    1. Click the edit button (pen symbol) to change the business name and description.
    2. Click on the image to change the Profile picture and upload a new one.
    3. Images may include the photograph of your clinic, a photograph of the provider, etc.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)

    Location
    • The information related to the business’s location comes under this section.
    • Initially the location added to the provider profile during the initial profile set up, will be automatically set as the base location.
    • The provider can edit the base location as well. To do so, click on the edit button.
    • To add working hours to the location, a provider needs to go to “Locations” under Check-In Manager”.
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - NO   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)

         Location Amenities
    • Location amenities are resources, conveniences, facilities or benefits offered to the customers for their use.
    • A provider can manage the location amenities here. Choose the available amenities from the list. The following table shows the location amenities for the Personal Care Sector.

    1. Beauty Care/Spa/Hair Salon
    • 24 hours
    • Parking
    2. Fitness Trainer/ Gym
    • 24 hours
    • Parking
    3. Massage Centre
    • 24 hours
    • Emergency Services
    • Parking
    SEARCHABLE - YES   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)

         Working Hours
    Working hours of the base location are shown here. The provider can click here to redirect to the Working Hours page. Here provider can add or edit the working hours. The working hours for other business locations are also shown in this page.
    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)
    PRIVACY SETTINGS
    Getting to know and controlling your privacy settings (Phone number & Email address) is an important strategy to protect your information. Here the system allows the provider to add, edit or delete both phone number and email address.
    Phone
    1. A provider can view the phone number used to create a Jaldee account. By default, the visibility of the number is set to none.
    2. The three dots menu on the right corner has two options, namely, Edit and Delete.
    3. If a provider wants to edit an entry, he/she can click on the “Edit” button. Here, the provider can change the phone number, phone label (for example, mobile, emergency, mainline or others) and also the visibility of the number.
    4. The phone number is shown in the profile’s detailed view in customer’s dashboard. This helps the customers to contact provider easily.
    5. The provider has an option to restrict the visibility of the phone number. Two options to filter the visibility are:
      • Public(All can see) : When set to Public, everyone can see the provider’s number.
      • Private(None can see) : When set to Private, only the provider can view the phone number.
      • None
    6. A provider can also delete a phone number. To do so, click “Delete” from the three dots menu on the right corner.
         Email
    1. A provider can add, edit and delete the email address here.
    2. The three dots menu on the right corner has two options, viz. Edit and Delete.
    3. In case, a provider wants to edit an entry, he/she can click on the “Edit” button. Here, the provider can change the email address, email label (for example,Office Email Id, Personal Email Id, etc.) and also the visibility of the email address.
    4. The email address provided here is shown to the customers in the detailed view of the provider profile.
    5. The provider has an option to restrict the visibility of the email address. Three options to filter the visibility are:
      • Public(All can see) : When set to Public, everyone can see the provider’s email.
      • My Customers only (Customers who checks-in for the services) : When set to ‘My customers only’, the email is visible only to the provider’s customers.
      • Private(None can see) : When set to Private, only the provider can view the email.
    6. A provider can delete an email address. To do so, click “Delete” from the three dots menu on the right corner.
    7. Jaldee.com uses the email address to communicate the general notifications to the provider, such as notifications on invoice, Jaldee coupons, discounts, etc.
    SEARCHABLE - NO   (The Searchable label indicates that customers can search for the provider using mentioned attributes.)
    VIEWABLE - YES   (The Viewable label indicates that customers can only view the attributes in providers profile in search results.)
    SPECIALIZATION
    Specializations benefits both the provider and the customer. Here a provider can select his/her specialization from the given list. Below table shows the specialization list of the personal care sector.
    Beauty Care/Spa/Hair Salon : Specialization
    1. Acupressure Therappy
    2. Beauty Care For Men
    3. Beauty Care For Women
    4. Ear Candling
    5. Ear Piercing
    6. Galvanic Therapy
    7. Hair Salon for Kids
    8. Hair Salon for Men
    9. Hair Salon for Women
    10. Henna Art
    11. Moroccan Bath
    12. Nail Art
    13. Spa/Body Therapy
    14. Tattoos
    15. Tummy Reducing Therapy
    16. Unisex Beauty Care
    17. Wedding Packages
         Fitness Trainer/ Gym : Specialization
    1. General Training
    2. Strength Training
    3. Personal Training
    4. Cardio Workout
    5. Hard Core Body Building
    6. Physiotherapy
    7. Diet Counselling
    8. Aerobics
    9. Zumba
    10. Yoga Training
         Massage Center : Specialization

    2. Asian Massage Therapy
    3. MyoFascial Release

    5. Soft Tissue Release
